products.title: Royal Upholstered Bed
products.shortDescription: Handcrafted luxury bed with premium upholstery
products.longDescription: Our Royal Upholstered Bed exemplifies the perfect marriage of comfort and craftsmanship. Each piece is meticulously handcrafted by master artisans using sustainably sourced hardwood frames and premium upholstery fabrics. The deep button-tufted headboard provides both visual interest and ergonomic support for reading in bed.

products.title: Heritage Three-Seater Sofa
products.longDescription: The Heritage Three-Seater is a timeless piece that brings warmth to any living space. Hand-built on a solid hardwood frame with traditional joinery techniques, this sofa features deep seats filled with a layered combination of springs, foam, and down for unmatched comfort.

products.title: Modern Linen Sofa
products.longDescription: Clean lines and plush comfort define our Modern Linen Sofa. Upholstered in breathable Belgian linen, this piece offers a relaxed yet refined aesthetic perfect for modern interiors.

products.title: Minimalist Platform Bed
products.longDescription: Our Minimalist Platform Bed celebrates simplicity and functionality. The low-profile design and clean lines create a sense of calm in the bedroom.

products.title: Sectional L-Shaped Couch
products.longDescription: Perfect for large living spaces, our Sectional L-Shaped Couch provides ample seating while maintaining an elegant profile.

products.title: Four-Poster Canopy Bed
products.longDescription: Make a statement with our Four-Poster Canopy Bed. Hand-carved from solid wood, each post features intricate detailing.

products.title: Classic Chesterfield Sofa
products.longDescription: The epitome of British elegance, our Chesterfield Sofa features deep button tufting and rolled arms.

products.title: Modular Sectional Couch
products.longDescription: Adapt to your lifestyle with our Modular Sectional. Reconfigure pieces as needed for ultimate versatility.

products.title: Hydraulic Storage Bed
products.longDescription: Maximize your bedroom space with our Hydraulic Storage Bed featuring easy-lift hydraulics.

products.title: Bespoke Design Service
products.longDescription: Work directly with our master craftsmen to create a truly unique piece. From initial concept to final delivery, we'll guide you through every step.

products.title: Mid-Century Loveseat
products.longDescription: Inspired by 1950s design, our Mid-Century Loveseat features tapered wooden legs and button tufting.

products.title: Deep Lounge Couch
products.longDescription: Extra-deep seats and oversized cushions make this the ultimate relaxation couch.

portfolioProjects.title: Modern Penthouse Living Room
portfolioProjects.description: Complete custom furniture suite for a 3000 sq ft penthouse featuring bespoke sectional, dining set, and bedroom furniture.

portfolioProjects.title: Boutique Hotel Suites
portfolioProjects.description: 42 rooms furnished with custom beds, seating, and storage solutions maintaining brand aesthetics.

portfolioProjects.title: Heritage Home Restoration
portfolioProjects.description: Period-accurate custom furniture for a restored 1920s manor house.

portfolioProjects.title: Executive Office Suite
portfolioProjects.description: Bespoke desk, conference table, and seating for a C-suite office.

testimonials.name: Sarah Mitchell
testimonials.content: Bēige & Oak transformed our client's vision into reality. The attention to detail and quality of craftsmanship exceeded all expectations.

testimonials.name: James Chen
testimonials.content: We commissioned a custom sectional and the entire process was seamless. The team guided us through material selection and the final piece is stunning.

testimonials.name: Emily Rodriguez
testimonials.content: For our boutique hotel, we needed furniture that was both beautiful and durable. Bēige & Oak delivered on both counts.
